about_the_game:
Game


Parallel is a free to play digital trading card game built in a thrilling sci-fi universe. Collect cards, build decks, and battle your peers in a strategic battle for control of Earth. Combine cards from one of the five factions and the Universal pool to create a 40 card deck.

Explore unique mechanics like Shroud's Singularity and Earthen's Decay as you fight your way to victory. Leverage units, effects, upgrades, and relics on your path to power.

Story


Earth, once bountiful, was nearly depleted of its ability to sustain life. Humankind grew increasingly desperate to find an unlimited source of energy to rely upon. Brilliant minds around the world assembled for the sake of Earth's salvation. At a loss for alternatives, they began experimenting with fission augmented by anti-matter. In their haste, they unleashed catastrophe on an unprecedented scale. Fleeing certain death, the mass exodus of Earth began. This course led to the inception of five parallel streams.


- The Earthen, a civilization of those left behind, remained and cultivated a thriving society through patience and perseverance. Protect the earth with unrivaled defensive capabilities. Enforce peace, or use the strength gifted by the cataclysmic priming to dictate the flow of battle.


- The Kathari developed groundbreaking enhancements to the human genome deep below the frigid surface of Jupiter's moon, Europa. Copy and clone your way to victory with overwhelming numbers. Field cutting edge genetic science to unleash a whole host of symbiotic units.


- The Marcolians, in pursuit of absolute supremacy rose and promptly laid claim to the entire red planet of Mars. Wield lightning fast aggression as well as a plethora of devastating fire support and armored vehicles in your relentless assault.


- The Augencore found refuge on their foundry ship Caine-1, augmenting themselves for deep space travel. Utilize the iconic war machines of the Augencore. Pilot mechs into combat or bionically enhance your units through upgrades until none can withstand.


- The Shroud, a mysterious presence in the universe– whereabouts currently unknown. Devastate those who oppose through manipulating the battlefield and unleashing powerful late game units.

For 10,000 years each Parallel would advance their way of life far beyond the constraints of Earth. New homes that were once considered fiction, became reality. However, at last, the spark that humankind had kindled on Earth those millennia ago has ignited into the unlimited power source that was promised, calling each Parallel back home. This energy-rich invitation brings new conflict, as each Parallel believes Earth is theirs to claim.

name: Parallel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1660 6GB DDRS
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 12GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Earth, 10,000 years in the future. Five parallel evolutions of humanity fight for control of the planet they once called home. Pick a faction, build a deck, and battle your peers from around the world for control over Earth and the ultimate source of power in the galaxy.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
